modmenu.descriptionTranslation.goop: Adds Splatter Particle Effects for Blood, Slime or other cool VFX
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.fancyG: Disable for better performance, enable for better goop!
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.wrapTo: Whether Goop should wrap to block edges
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.censor: Replaces Blood VFX colors with neon Pink.
text.autoconfig.ultracraft.option.goopDe: [WARNING] VERY LAGGY | Adds extra particles to show vertex info of goop puddles
